title.rendered: Search Berg awarded the 2019 Certificate of Excellence by Bark

content.rendered:
Another feather in the cap for Search Berg! The leading internet marketing company has recently been awarded the 2019 Certificate of Excellence by Bark, a popular review site. This recognition is one amongst many accolades Search Berg has achieved in its almost decade long career, gaining an impressive clientele along the way.

One Milestone after Another

Search Berg has worked with thousands of clients, completing an array of diverse projects over the course of almost 10 years. We first passed 10,000 SEO projects back in 2016; a landmark by all standards for us at that time. Since then, we’ve never looked back and just last December, we completed 20,000 SEO projects; an unthinkable achievement. All the hard work, and dedication that went into accomplishing this staggering feat, has paid off and we want to take this opportunity to thank our clients for making this possible. It must be mentioned that Search Berg is also the recipient of the Site Jabber Customer Choice Award for SEO in 2017 and 2018, 2 years in a row.

Taking The Next Step – A True Mark of Excellence.

Awards like the Certificate of Excellence only encourage us to pursue digital marketing more passionately. Our digital marketing experts are constantly looking at the Google ranking algorithm trends; coming up with new solutions and strategies to cater to the ever changing, ever complex needs of clients today.

In 2019, we plan to take digital marketing to the next level. We are offering industry specific SEO. Our experts have specialty in over 30 industries including Healthcare, travel, finance, lifestyle, HVAC, and real estate. Each project is handled by team of experts with industry-specific knowledge and skills to create high ranking SEO content for the client.

Get in touch with the company for a full description of their services or request a free audit report.
